channel.title: Data Storage on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Data Storage on FinanClub

item.title: PSTG
item.description: score:95 Chances: Pure Storage Inc. is set to replace another company in the S&P MidCap 400 index, which could lead to increased visibility and potential investment from index funds. The company’s all-flash storage platform is being leveraged by Toss Bank in South Korea, indicating the adoption of Pure Storage’s technology by a fast-growing financial institution.
